models.name: EmptyRecord
models.doc: An literally empty record.  Intended as a marker to indicate the absence of content where a record type is required.  If used the underlying DataMap *must* be empty, EmptyRecordValidator is provided to help enforce this.  For example,  CreateRequest extends Request<EmptyRecord> to indicate it has no response body.   Also, a ComplexKeyResource implementation that has no ParamKey should have a signature like XyzResource implements ComplexKeyResource<XyzKey, EmptyRecord, Xyz>.

models.name: ExecutionStatus
models.doc: Execution status for a flow or job

symbolDocs.PENDING: Flow or job is in pending state.
symbolDocs.PENDING_RESUME: Flow or job is currently resuming.
symbolDocs.PENDING_RETRY: Flow or job is pending retry.
symbolDocs.RUNNING: Flow or job is currently executing

Job state that is updated only at the start and end of a job execution.

fields.name: issues

items.name: Issue
items.doc:
Issue describes a specific unique problem in the job or application.

Issue can be generated from log entries, health checks, and other places.

fields.name: time

type.name: Timestamp
type.doc:
Epoch/UNIX time in milliseconds

Represents the number of milliseconds since the epoch of 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z

fields.doc: Time when the issue have occured

fields.name: severity
fields.doc: Severity from DEBUG to FATAL

fields.name: code
fields.doc:
Unique machine-readable code that identifies a specific problem.

It can be used for making programmatic decisions on how to handle and recover from this issue.

Issues representing the same kind of problem will have the same code.

fields.name: summary
fields.doc:
Short, human-readable description of the issue.

It should focus on what is the root cause of the problem, and what steps the user should do to resolve it.

fields.name: details
fields.doc: Human-readable issue details that can include exception stack trace and additional information about the problem.

fields.name: properties
fields.doc: Additional machine-readable properties of the issue.

Collection of issues for the job.

Can include various errors and warnings that will help the user to troubleshoot problems.
Status of jobs belonging to the flow
